'''The Hearth's Ashen Shadow''' is a [[Character Event Wish]] with the 5 Star [[Character]] "Dire Balemoon" [[Arlecchino]] ({{Pyro}}) as the promoted character with an increased chance to be obtained.

==History==
{{Wish History Table|The Hearth's Ashen Shadow}}

==Trivia==
* The first occurrence of this Wish Series ran alongside an [[Epitome Invocation]] Wish featuring [[Crimson Moon's Semblance]], a weapon that both is tailored to Arlecchino's gameplay mechanics and can transform into a scythe only when wielded by Arlecchino.
